titles.title: DHS Cybersecurity Internship Program Act
DHS Cybersecurity Internship Program Act
DHS Cybersecurity Internship Program Act
A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to establish a DHS Cybersecurity Internship Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Peters with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 118-331.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 751.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
